document_data.caption: The High Desert of west Zakhara.
document_data.name: High Desert
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Desert''' was the more westerly of the two great deserts that dominated the elevated interior of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Geographical Features:
*[[Al-Adib River]] (River of Courtesy)
*[[Burning Pool of Natifa]]
*[[Genies' Anvil]]
*[[Mountains of Forgotten Dreams]]
*[[Pit of the Ghuls]]
*[[Spire of Kor]]
*[[Vishap's Teeth]]
document_data.Inhabitants: A number of mostly [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] desert nomads, called [[Al-Badia]] in [[Midani]], roamed the High Desert organized into major and minor tribes.
document_data.Major tribes:
*[[House of Asad]] (Children of the Lion)
*[[House Bakr|House of Bakr]] (Clan of the Young Camel)
*[[House of Dhi'b]] (Sons of the Wolf)
*[[House of Dubb]] (House of the Bear)
*[[House of Nasr]] (People of the Eagle)
*[[House of Sihr]] ([[Jann]] of the High Desert)
*[[House of Tayif]] (Ghost-Warriors)
*[[House of Thawr]] (Childeren of the Bull)
*[[House of Uqab]] (League of the Vulture)
